roleset.name: insert a small tube into

example.name: Patient
example.text: When-1 should you catheterize little boys *T*-1?

example.name: Body part
example.text: Dr. John will catheterize the heart of the patient on Monday.

example.name: Arg1
example.text: How do you check for coronary artery spasm during heart catheterization?
